I am a PhD student at VISLab at the Data Science Research Network at Worcester Polytechnic Institute (WPI) in Worcester, MA.

I previously worked on the Clinical Data Animation Center (CDAC) team at Mass. General Hospital (MGH) in Boston.

My research focuses on the intersection of computer vision and neuro/biomedical informatics. I work a lot on experimental design and I think hard about how experimentation can be better and more efficient. I’m also interested in better applying the machinery of machine learning to observational causal inference.

I’m interested in optimization on the fundamental problems of computer vision and machine learning.
